properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 9:22AM AKST until February 18 at 5:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph.
Visibility of one half mile or less. Total snow accumulations of
up to 2 inches.

* WHERE...Pribilof Islands.

* WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 5 AM AKST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce
visibility. Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...North to northwesterly winds will
increase this afternoon, causing blowing snow conditions for
the Pribilof Islands. Winds will weaken Tuesday morning as the
associated low moves eastward.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM AKST TUESDAY
